• 14 in 100 pregnant women

Abnormal and great sense of uneasiness, 
worry or fear. 
Emotional symptoms: Tiredness Nervous/ 
Worry/ Panic/ Irritability/ Feeling of dread/ 
Fear of being alone. 
Physical symptoms: 
Sleep problems/Physical tension/Sweating/ 
Increased pulse/ Body aches/ stomach 
problems (nausea, diarrhoea)/ Difficulty 
concentrating. 
GAD: 
• Symptoms for at least 6 months
• excessive, uncontrollable, and
irrational worry about everyday
things
